name: SAMIR ALAM
college: Hindustan Institute of Science and Technology

full_output.summary: As a soon-to-be graduate in 2025, I possess a robust skill set honed through studies and extracurricular activities, with expertise in multitasking and managing coursework, projects, and part-time roles, recognized for diligence and proactive problem-solving, resulting in consistent academic success.  Eager to apply my skills in a professional environment, I bring a fresh perspective and passionate commitment to contributing to cutting-edge web projects, prioritizing the development of user-friendly and visually appealing websites.  With a strong foundation in coding practices and excellent problem-solving skills, I am committed to delivering high-quality work and making meaningful contributions to the field of web development.

projects.name: FitTrack+
projects.description: A Dynamic Web Application that seamlessly integrates gym playlists, personalized diet plans, and curated exercise routines for everyday fitness needs. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering an intuitive user interface and dynamic features for enhanced usability. Hosted on GitHub Pages, providing easy access to curated content for achieving holistic health and wellness goals.

projects.name: BreezeBlog
projects.description: A React.js-based microblogging site designed for effortless content creation and sharing in a refreshing and streamlined manner. Tailored with user-friendly features and modern design elements using Tailwind CSS, BreezeBlog offers a breezy and enjoyable microblogging environment for creators and readers alike.

projects.name: ReactJS based Personal Portfolio site
projects.description: Built with React.js, my personal portfolio site serves as a dynamic showcase of my projects, skills, and achievements, offering visitors an engaging glimpse into my work, while being equipped with serverless form submission capabilities for efficient communication. Enhanced with serverless form submission capabilities, the site provides a seamless and hassle-free way for visitors to reach out and connect with me, ensuring efficient communication and interaction. Featuring a sleek and modern design, the portfolio site offers an intuitive user experience, allowing visitors to explore my work effortlessly and engage with the content in a visually appealing manner.
